subject: Commercial Bank of New York
body:
Commercial Bank of New York
Head Office
ADDRESS:320 Park Avenue
New York, NY 10022 United States
Attn:Sir/Ma
Commercial bank of New York,wish to find out if your inheritance
fund/next of kins/contractor fund e.g has been credited to your
account as reported in our database? Confirm the status to me by this
my e-mail  
infocomuus@aol.com
 immediately
if I did not receive any response from you within the next 48hrs, we
shall assume your part payment of $10,500,000.00 Million has been
successfully received by you.
Best Regards,
Dr/Mrs.Albina Abbey James
(Branch Manager)

subject: Re:   Commercial Bank of New York
body:
Hello Dr. Abbey James,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the Commercial Bank of New York. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your efforts in keeping me informed about my account and funds.

I would like to confirm the status of my account and the reported credit of funds. Could you please provide me with more details regarding the specific fund you mentioned? I want to ensure that everything is in order.

Additionally, could you kindly clarify what you mean by "part payment of Million"? I want to make sure I understand the information correctly.

Thank you again for your assistance, Dr. Abbey James. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel
